author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/mandragora/

In Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree, you can progress and customize your Inquisitor to your liking. Discover how you can use Gear to your advantage in this Feature Spotlight!

Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree is a dark fantasy action RPG coming to PlayStation®5 on April 17, 2025. Battle monsters across an expansive story, craft powerful upgrades, and explore this vast, ruined world before Entropy consumes it. Add it to your wishlist today!

#ps5 #ps5games #mandragora
title: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Feature Spotlight: Gear Progression | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011666


Kemono Heroes combines elements of run and gun, fast arcade action with dashes and slashes, with cool and fluffy characters.

It can be experienced alone, choosing between 3 difficulties to enjoy a real challenge.

Up to 4 friends can also join forces in cooperative mode, fighting and helping each other to overcome any obstacles in their way.

After A Hole New World, an 8-bit like game, we thought we should make a 16-bit-like game now.

An arcade cooperative one, for 4 players, with ninjas on it! Thus Kemono Heroes was born!

Features:

- Run ‘n Slash ‘n Gun.
- Local cooperative 1-4 players.
- Amazing 16 bit graphics.
- 4 main characters, each of them with special skills.
- 4 worlds with 3 stages each.
- Unlockable weapons and powers.
- Lots of fun and action!

Kemono Heroes is available now!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Kemono Heroes - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/dead-by-daylight/

Teeth gnash, grinding and gorging until nothing is left. A black and scarlet eye blazes above a grotesque grin. The screams turn to gurgles as his victims plead for mercy that will never come.  

Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul is coming.   

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #deadbydaylight
title: Dead by Daylight - Tokyo Ghoul Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Karma: the Dark world is a first-person cinematic psychological horror title where players will be investigating the deepest secrets of their suspects’ minds.

Set in an alternate timeline where post-war Germany has fallen into a dystopian state, ruled over by the Leviathan Corporation using mass surveillance and mind bending technology - what starts out as another case for Roam Agent Daniel McGovern, sees him uncover a world of deceit and betrayal, where he begins to doubt everything he knows, including his own identity. 

Inspired by the works of visionary creators such as David Lynch (Twin Peaks), Hideo Kojima (Metal Gear Solid, Death Stranding), and Christopher Nolan (Inception, Interstellar), KARMA: The Dark World pushes the boundaries of immersive storytelling. Developed in Unreal Engine 5, the game promises to deliver a gripping and visually stunning experience. 

KARMA: The Dark World is out now on PlayStation®5 for $24.99 with a 10% launch discount for PS Plus Members

May c
title: Karma: The Dark World - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008503/

Explore the gameplay and motivations of the key members of Expedition 33 as they set course to destroy the Paintress so she may never paint death again.

Meet Lune, the passionate Scholar and Mage. The daughter of prominent researchers, Lune has a deep thirst for knowledge and has sacrificed everything to complete her parents’ work.  Her one goal is to unravel the mystery of the Paintress. Entrusted with charting a path for the Expedition, Lune feels keenly the weight of responsibility and the stakes involved.
She cannot and will not allow the Expedition to fail.

Expedition 33 will release on April 24 2025 on Playstation 5. Pre-order now!"

Rated Mature

#ps5 #ps5games #clairobscur
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Lune Character Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/v-rising/

For centuries, the Oakveil Woodlands went untouched by man, its nature flourishing. That peace has come to an end. A ruthless force has infiltrated from the sea: fierce warriors bound to Megara, their Serpent Queen, corrupting the land and twisting the abundant life into deadly weapons. Enter Oakveil, uncover the forbidden alchemy of the Venom Blades, and claim their power before it’s too late.

Conquer or be consumed.

#ps5 #ps5games #vrising
title: V Rising - Invaders of Oakveil Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

description:

In this charming and emotional story, you'll meet Morris, a budding jazz musician whose greatest passion is playing the piano. The game allows you to experience his perspective on life, where things don’t always go as planned. Follow Morris’s journey, meet the residents of Evans City, work to make ends meet, and practice playing the piano to understand the daily life of the main character in Blue Wednesday.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Blue Wednesday - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013913

Bubble Ghost Remake brings back the beloved classic with a fresh, modern twist on PS5®. Guide the mischievous little ghost through a haunted mansion, using only your breath to navigate a fragile bubble past tricky obstacles and eerie traps. With beautifully reimagined visuals, enhanced physics-based gameplay, and a brand-new soundtrack, Bubble Ghost Remake captures the charm of the original while introducing new levels, challenges, and secrets to uncover.
Get ready to float, blow, and puzzle your way through a whimsical ghostly adventure.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Bubble Ghost Remake - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
